name: Connect-4
tagline: Just another Java-based Connect 4 application. Made for an A.I. course in University of Rome "La Sapienza" with Prof. Toni Mancini
body:
#Summary#

This application was created for an A.I. course in University of Rome "La Sapienza" with Prof. Toni Mancini.

Click [here](http://tmancini.di.uniroma1.it/index.php?page=teaching.ia) to visit the course page. ##Recommended Requirements:## - Java 1.6 or higher - 4 GB of RAM ###Developed by:### Alessio Mecca - alessio.mecca@hotmail.it Samuele Pontremoli - samuele.pontremoli@gmail.com Marianna Progan√≤ - marianna.p91@live.com [![githalytics.com alpha](https://cruel-carlota.pagodabox.com/a4ccd1285eabfe3a60f2fda0bbae6df5 "githalytics.com")](http://githalytics.com/sam-0101/Connect-4)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
